headline: The Procter & Gamble Company (PG) Reports Mixed Second-Quarter 2026 Results Amid Weak Consumer Spending
summary: The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) is included in our list of the best stocks to buy and hold for 20 years. headline: How consumer brands are trying to offset tariff costs
summary: Citi VP US Beverages and HPC lead analyst Filippo Falorni weighs in on how trade tariffs are impacting consumer-facing brands like Procter & Gamble (PG), while also commenting on Shailesh Jejurikar's first earnings call as the new CEO of P&G. Catch Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi's full interview with Procter & Gamble (PG) CFO Andre Schulten. Also watch Filippo Falorni share his general thoughts on P&G's fiscal second quarter earnings. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: How consumer brands are trying to offset tariff costs
content.description:
Citi VP US Beverages and HPC lead analyst Filippo Falorni weighs in on how trade tariffs are impacting consumer-facing brands like Procter & Gamble (PG), while also commenting on Shailesh Jejurikar's first earnings call as the new CEO of P&G.

Catch Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi's full interview with Procter & Gamble (PG) CFO Andre Schulten.

Also watch Filippo Falorni share his general thoughts on P&G's fiscal second quarter earnings.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

Catch Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi's full interview with Procter & Gamble (PG) CFO Andre Schulten. Also watch Filippo Falorni share his general thoughts on P&G's fiscal second quarter earnings.
